definition: (medicine) any disturbance in the functioning of an organ or body part or a disturbance in the functioning of a social group
details:
noun
- (medicine) any disturbance in the functioning of an organ or body part or a disturbance in the functioning of a social group
= example: (medicine) any disturbance in the functioning of an organ or body part or a disturbance in the functioning of a social group
= synonyms: disfunction
